summary.span: 管理使用者設定檔資料和設定。

span.span: Manages user profile data and settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 設定檔用來儲存和擷取資料來源，例如資料庫中的使用者設定。The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用存取使用者設定檔屬性的目前。The user profile is accessed using the property of the current . 使用設定檔提供者管理設定檔資訊和屬性值。Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider. 類別用來管理設定檔設定、 搜尋的使用者設定檔，以及刪除不再使用的使用者設定檔。The class is used to manage profile settings, search for user profiles, and delete user profiles that are no longer in use. 類別提供靜態方法和屬性，可以參考來存取應用程式程式碼中的類別。The class provides static methods and properties that can be accessed by referencing the class in your application code. 如需範例，請參閱本主題中的範例 > 一節和主題中的其他範例之成員的類別。For an example, see the Example section in this topic and additional examples in the topics for members of the class. 根據預設，已停用所有 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者設定檔。By default, the user profile is disabled for all ASP.NET applications. 若要啟用的使用者設定檔，設定`enabled`屬性為 true，如下列範例所示的組態項目。To enable the user profile, set the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to true, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 如需使用者設定檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the user profile, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 設定檔提供者用來儲存及擷取使用者設定檔中的屬性。A profile provider is used to store and retrieve properties in the user profile. .NET Framework 包含類別，以 SQL Server 資料庫中儲存使用者設定檔屬性。The .NET Framework includes a class that stores user profile properties in a SQL Server database. A名為執行個體`AspNetSqlProvider`做為預設設定檔提供者的電腦組態中指定。A instance named `AspNetSqlProvider` is specified in the machine configuration as the default profile provider. `AspNetSqlProvider`連接至本機 Web 伺服器上的 SQL Server 資料庫的執行個體。The `AspNetSqlProvider` instance connects to the SQL Server database on the local Web server. 您可以指定，以連接至另一個 SQL Server 預設設定檔提供者所使用的組態項目和`defaultProvider`的組態項目，如下列範例所示的屬性。You can specify a that connects to another SQL Server as the default profile provider by using the configuration element and the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用 ASP.NET 網頁類別來管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that uses the class to manage inactive profiles. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存及擷取設定檔資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

value.span: 要儲存及擷取設定檔資訊的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用與不同的應用程式相關聯的設定檔資訊屬性。The uses the property to associate profile information with different applications. 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者資訊而不重複的使用者之間發生衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users. 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的使用者資料庫，藉由指定相同值的屬性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以程式設計方式設定屬性，或者它可以是以宣告方式設定 Web 應用程式組態檔中使用`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未指定值`applicationName`屬性為 Web 應用程式組態檔中，則會使用.NET Framework 隨附的設定檔提供者ASP.NET 應用程式的屬性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the profile providers included with the .NET Framework use the property value for ASP.NET applications. 對於非 ASP.NET 應用程式，預設值是屬性值，不含副檔名。For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the property value, without the file extension. 屬性會公開屬性的預設設定檔提供者。The property exposes the property of the default profile provider. 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，它們可能設定為使用不同的應用程式名稱。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they may be configured with a different application name. 若要存取預設提供者以外的設定檔提供者的應用程式名稱，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考屬性和存取直接在提供者的屬性。To access the application name of a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and access the property of the provider directly. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設設定檔提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免撰寫程式碼，讓使用者設定屬性除非您需要它。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you require it. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理多個應用程式的設定檔資料。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中顯示的項目。The following configuration file excerpt shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會將應用程式的預設設定檔提供者設執行個體和設定至`MyApplication`。It sets the application's default profile provider to a instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用應用程式的自動儲存使用者設定檔。The property indicates whether automatic saving of the user profile is enabled for the application. 如果已啟用自動儲存，物件引發事件並呼叫方法期間事件結尾的 ASP.NET 網頁的執行。If automatic saving is enabled, the object raises the event and calls the method during the event at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 屬性會設定使用`automaticSaveEnabled`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性。The property is set using the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute of the element in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中顯示的項目。The following configuration file excerpt shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的預設設定檔提供者執行個體和設定`automaticSaveEnabled`屬性`true`。It specifies the application's default profile provider to a instance and sets the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute to `true`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源中移除未使用的設定檔資料`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔與，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`會刪除參數值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted. 方法呼叫方法的預設設定檔提供者。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會刪除其他資料來源中的設定檔資訊。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the profile information in the other data source is not deleted. 若要刪除非使用中預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考屬性並呼叫的提供者直接的方法。To delete inactive profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 若要刪除已被指定數天內未使用，因此視為非使用中的所有設定檔提供的按鈕。A button is provided to delete all profiles that have been unused for the specified number of days and are therefore considered inactive. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的使用者設定檔屬性`username`從指定的資料來源。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the user profile for the specified `username` from the data source for the specified . 方法呼叫方法來執行刪除作業的預設設定檔提供者。The method calls the method of the default profile provider to perform the delete operation. 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，不會刪除它們。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted. 若要刪除預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔屬性，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考屬性並呼叫的提供者直接的方法。To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 單一設定檔選取要刪除時，呼叫方法。The method is called when a single profile is selected to be deleted. 設定檔是否視為非使用中時，根據針對指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值傳遞至方法。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從指定的應用程式的資料來源刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的設定檔屬性屬性。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the property. 若要刪除的設定檔的清單已指定為使用者名稱的字串陣列。The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names. 如果設定檔內容及資訊存在於資料來源中的使用者名稱`usernames`參數，就會刪除它們。If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted. 傳回的值可能不同於指定之陣列的長度`usernames`。The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`. 這表示指定的陣列中的設定檔的某些`usernames`已經從資料存放區刪除。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store. 方法呼叫方法的預設設定檔提供者。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，不會刪除它們。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted. 若要刪除預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔屬性，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考屬性並呼叫的提供者直接的方法。To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. A控制項會顯示傳回非作用中的設定檔。A control displays the inactive profiles returned. 每個資料列的控制項包含一個按鈕，刪除該資料列的設定檔資料來源藉由呼叫方法。Each row of the control includes a button that deletes the profile for that row from the data source with a call to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回所有設定檔資訊的使用者名稱符合所提供清單`usernameToMatch`所設定的參數值屬性值。The method returns a list of all profile information for which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured property value. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 您可以擷取使用的多載的資料頁面中的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊採用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。You can retrieve profile information for user profiles in pages of data using the overload for the method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 請注意，您的設定檔提供者可能支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。Note that your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 例如，方法類別支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。For example, the method of the class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 方法呼叫方法的預設設定檔提供者。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要尋找預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考屬性並呼叫的提供者直接的方法。To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和列舉值和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔資訊。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a enumeration value and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 此範例可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非作用中的設定檔。The example allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果使用者指定只有非作用中設定檔，方法是呼叫，否則方法呼叫。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來擷取指定的應用程式的資料來源的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 您可以擷取的頁面物件使用的多載的使用者設定檔採用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。You can retrieve pages of objects for user profiles using the overload for the method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 方法呼叫方法的預設設定檔提供者。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要尋找預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考屬性並呼叫的提供者直接的方法。To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示所有設定的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`。The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考所有啟用的應用程式的設定檔提供者，包括提供者加入電腦組態中，並提供者加入所有 Web.config 檔案。The property references all of the profile providers enabled for an application, including providers added in the machine configuration and providers added in all Web.config files. 您可以控制哪一個設定檔提供者可供使用的項目區段的組態檔中的應用程式。You can control which profile providers are available for an application using the element of the section in the configuration file. 例如，下列 Web.config 檔案中移除父組態檔中指定的設定檔提供者，並將與應用程式的設定檔提供者執行個體。For example, the following Web.config file removes the profile providers specified in parent configuration files and adds a instance as the profile provider for the application. ``` ``` 在指定的區段時，您必須指定預設提供者藉由設定`defaultProvider`屬性。When specifying the section, you must specify a default provider by setting the `defaultProvider` attribute. 如果您未在 Web.config 檔案中指定區段，會使用電腦組態中的值和做為預設提供者建立名為 Languagekeyword>aspnetsqlprovider< 執行個體。If you do not specify a section in your Web.config file, the values from the machine configuration are used and the instance named AspNetSqlProvider is established as the default provider. 您可以取得的提供者的強型別的參考索引名稱的設定檔提供者，並將它轉型為所需的型別集合。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the profile provider by name and casting it as the desired type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types.
